KSP: 1.5.1 64bit

Problem: Game crashes when changing scenes.

Mods: (all updated for 1.5.1)
[x] Science
Mechjeb
Scansat

Reproduction steps: Just sort of playing along. Game crashes after a while of playing.

Log: 
https://pastebin.com/WcvpzW8D

Seems like it's a running out of memory thing? Except that memory cap should be isolated to 32bit? 

Edited October 30, 2018 by delta44
Error log got cut off when pasting. Fixed.

You have plenty of Mem free.

We'll need the KSP.log, read the sticky at the top of the forum on where to find it.

Sounds like I've got the same problem as delta44

Game will up and crash at random. Haven't been able to force a reproduction but its crashed every time I've played recently.

Here's a Dropbox folder with the error log, output log, and the list of mods I was crazy enough to start out with. https://www.dropbox.com/sh/v3suu6igbwge6va/AAAJ1T9yC4xJEM0LA6TjP9RVa?dl=0

All mods fully up to date and installed via CKAN

KSP version 1.5.1 64bit

It looks like that your KSP is trying to access a Ressource, that is protected the Kernel send a Signal to KSP.exe to close the process.

Try to run KSP as Administrator, i dont know if you are Admin or only User. it is possbile that "User" has no Permission to access some files in KSP-Folder, the Process KSP.exe have only the permissions that the User has who started it.

I never have this Problem (i'm Admin on my Computer)

 

Access Violation on Wikipedia:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Segmentation_fault

For both posters.
